risks.title: TSAN lane remains non-blocking while false-positive budget is stabilized
risks.notes: Promote tsan_experimental to blocking after two consecutive release cycles with deterministic pass behavior.

risks.title: Middleware-heavy benchmark concurrency ladder remains constrained to 1,4
risks.notes: Phase E benchmark follow-on must validate stability and confidence at higher concurrency levels.

risks.title: Temporary foundation JSON backend fallback remains enabled during cutover window
risks.notes: Remove foundation fallback after one release cycle once yyjson default rollout confidence remains stable.

risks.title: Suppression registry maintenance policy maturity
risks.notes: Phase 9H introduced lifecycle policy + validator; keep weekly review cadence in place.
